title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The StyledText should not redraw the entire client area when appending N lines in word wrap mode.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Start with a StyledText widget in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe that each line append triggers a redraw of the entire client area.

To verify the fix, add the following line to StyledText's performPaint method:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight); Check that the printed output does not show N redraws when appending N lines of text to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
